effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120. Target’s weight | Power --------------- | ----: Up to 10kg | 20 Up to 25kg | 40 Up to 50kg | 60 Up to 100kg | 80 Up to 200kg | 100 Above 200kg | 120
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120. Target’s weight | Power --------------- | ----: Up to 10kg | 20 Up to 25kg | 40 Up to 50kg | 60 Up to 100kg | 80 Up to 200kg | 100 Above 200kg | 120
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120. Target’s weight | Power --------------- | ----: Up to 10kg | 20 Up to 25kg | 40 Up to 50kg | 60 Up to 100kg | 80 Up to 200kg | 100 Above 200kg | 120

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.
short_effect.platinum: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user snares the foe with grass and trips it. The heavier the foe, the greater the damage.
flavor_text.platinum: The user snares the foe with grass and trips it. The heavier the foe, the greater the damage.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user snares the foe with grass and trips it. The heavier the foe, the greater the damage.
